settings.title: Established in 1992, LPS Material Handling is the place to go for all your material handling equipment needs. As a family-owned-and-operated business with more than 111 years of combined work experience in the fields of sales, service, repair and training you can rest assured, that as a customer, you will be taken care of. With and honest business ethic and the belief that customer satisfaction is key LPS goes the extra mile to make sure that all your needs are taken care of a reasonable price and in a timely manner.
